page.title: 09Kington :Recreation
page.content: Some people were questioned about what they did in their spare time. The following three groups show the preferences of these groups. {Teenagers {Girls}- Cooking, knitting, drawing and painting, sewing, playing instruments, table tennis {Boys} - Air scouts, cadets, youth club, computers, model making {20-60 age group {Women}- Bowling, pony trotting, knitting, reading, gardening, cooking, out to meals, secretary of British Legion (Ladies Section), visiting theatre, gardening, WI, playgroup, treasures {Men} - Fishing, shooting, wine making, pub games esp darts, local councillor, ornothology, botany, walking, golf, local history. {(cont on next page)
